- See [Preparing for Class on March 23](https://sakai.duke.edu/portal/site/7910c7f6-38be-4607-865d-adf5b0156d4c/tool/162ed866-22a7-47f7-8021-ebd130edbf0a/discussionForum/message/dfViewThread) under the "Recording & Discussions" tab for details on Sakai. 

**In short:**

- Active your Duke Zoom account: https://oit.duke.edu/what-we-do/applications/zoom-meetings
  - If you need help getting access to Zoom, call or chat with a member of the OIT Help Desk: https://oit.duke.edu/help
  
- If you have't already, please fill out the course survey about your learning environment for the rest of the semester:  http://bit.ly/sta210-remote-survey

- Read through the course updates and write down any questions:

  - [Remote Learning Updates](https://www2.stat.duke.edu/courses/Spring20/sta210.001/covid-19-updates.html)
  - [Updated Course Schedule](https://www2.stat.duke.edu/courses/Spring20/sta210.001/schedule.html)
